name: Deathcotheque
description:
In Deathcoteque, you will have to go from one side of the discotheque to the other avoiding (or not) the traps. When you die, the corpse will stay in the death position, blocking some traps (or maybe blocking you).

Platforms: browser and PC (Windows).

Available languages: English.

Keyboard controls:

A / D or Left arrow / Right arrow - Move.

Space or Up arrow - Jump.

R - Restart.

Controller controls:

Left stick or D-Pad - Move.

A / B - Jump.

Left shoulder - Restart.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment or a message to me explaining what happened.

There's no music or SFX due to my lack of resources.

Other games: https://hodeix.itch.io/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Hodei_X
